review: He is a wonderful person I met in my life .*** ** * ****** *** ** **** ** *** *** ** With RHD when most of the doctors I met  suggested not to go for pregnancy it was him who gave me the courage to go for it .He suggested another wonderful doctor .I was able to carry out a very risky pregnancy under his guidance  and gave birth to beautiful kid .He is not that kind of a person who  advice surgery un necessary .If I have not met him my life would have been a hell

A down to earth and very learned and sympathetic to patients doctor, thoroughly professional .
I recommend.
Wonderful doctor a down-to-earth person who takes care of the patient very nicely and is easily approachable very few doctors have such good qualities our family owes him a lot.

A down to earth person with kind heart. Moreover he's from a place near to my native. He cared me during my tough time; prescribed minimum Medicines & more advice. My heartful Thanks to him & his Assistant .
